name: The Death of Santa Claus
description:
DOES NOT WORK ON SAFARI-- Safari does not support WebGL 2.0, please run using Chrome or Firefox browsers.

A short experience by Nicholas and Julian Way, based on the poem "The Death of Santa Claus" by Charles Webb.

Controls: 'right arrow' or 'd' to walk, 'esc' to stop (not pause, need to refresh after)

Download for Windows machines below

Thank you!
